dungeonsmod.wip_item: §7%s is a work in progress (WIP) item & has no functionality!
item.dungeonsmod.boots_of_swiftness.desc: Gives a short boost to movement speed
item.dungeonsmod.boots_of_swiftness.flav: §7Boots blessed with enchantments to allow for swift movements. Useful in uncertain times such as these
item.dungeonsmod.death_cap_mushroom.desc: Greatly increases attack and movement speed
item.dungeonsmod.death_cap_mushroom.flav: §7Eaton by daring warriors before battle, the Death Cap Mushroom drives fighters into a frenzy
item.dungeonsmod.iron_hide_amulet.descri: It provides a major boost to defense for a short time
item.dungeonsmod.iron_hide_amulet.flavou: §7The Iron Hide Amulet is both ancient and timeless. Sand mysteriously and endlessly slips through the cracks in the iron
item.dungeonsmod.love_medallion.descript: Turn up to thee hostile mobs into allies for ten seconds before they disappear
item.dungeonsmod.love_medallion.flavourT: §7A spell radiates from this trinket, enchanting those nearby into a trance where they must protect the holder of the medallion at all costs
item.dungeonsmod.soul_healer.description: Heals the most injured ally nearby, including yourself
item.dungeonsmod.soul_healer.flavourText: §7The Soul Healer amulet is cold to the touch and trembles with the power of souls. It is a common among the Illagers of the Woodland Mansions
item.dungeonsmod.totem_of_regeneration.d: A totem that creates a circular aura, healing you and your allies
item.dungeonsmod.totem_of_regeneration.f: §7This hand-crafted wooden figurine radiates a warmth like that of a crackling campfire, healing those who gather around it
item.dungeonsmod.totem_of_shielding.desc: This totem has mystical powers that shield those around it from projectiles
item.dungeonsmod.totem_of_shielding.flav: §7This totem radiates powerful energy that bursts forth as a protective shield around those near it
item.dungeonsmod.wind_horn.description: Pushes enemies away from you and slows them briefly
item.dungeonsmod.wind_horn.flavourText: §7When the Wind Horn echoes throughout the forests of the Overworld the creatures of the night tremble with fear
